about_the_game:
Vicera is an online co-op game. Play as relic hunters, solving enigmatic mysteries and escaping a terrifying monster. Will you dare to face the darkness to find the cursed relics?


Dive into a captivating adventure where exploration is the key to success.Discover two unique maps. On one side, a dense, mysterious forest, with ancient hunting camps, abandoned houses, a forgotten village and an underground labyrinth. On the other, an abandoned hospital. The maps are full of places to explore, each holding mysteries and clues to guide you to the cursed relic.


Prepare yourself for moments of intense terror. An elusive monster lurks in the darkness, ready to appear at any moment. Every dark corner can hide a deadly threat. The sinister atmosphere, eerie noises and unpredictable events will plunge you into the heart of horror, leaving you shivering with dread at every step.


Your quest to lift the curse that hangs over these lands will lead you to collect cursed relics. These ancient artifacts contain dark and dangerous powers. Can you survive their sinister effects while solving puzzles and collecting these precious relics? The temptation of their power is great, but at what price?


The adventure is even more terrifying when you share it. Join your friends in a thrilling cooperative gaming experience. Work together to solve puzzles, avoid the monster chasing you, and coordinate your efforts to overcome the challenges in your path.Survival depends on working together.


Immerse yourself in unrivalled graphics and immersion thanks to Unreal Engine 5. Stunning detail, realistic lighting and immersive environments will transport you to the heart of this cursed forest. Be dazzled by the power of next-generation game development.

Explore, survive, collect and play cooperatively in this unique horror gaming experience. Will you dare to face the darkness to uncover the hidden mysteries? Dive into the adventure now!


Feel free to use this email to contact us : crkgamesstudio@gmail.com

content_descriptors.notes: It's a horror game, so the atmosphere is constantly horrific, and the monsters that appear out of nowhere are pretty scary.
